lead_paragraph: ALLMAN--Daniel J.,died January 14, 2016. He is remembered lovingly by his family which includes Michael, Jack and Eileen, Jennifer and Minas, and two treasured grand-nieces, as well as by devoted friends who include Barbara and Laurie of New Directions Publishing, and Sylvia. We cherish Dan's warmth and charm and ever- present wit. And we shall not forget that with him in our hearts we'll always have Paris and Oak Grove too. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ALLMAN, DANIEL J.
